summary:
Retexturizes female, head, body, hands, for all races except Khajiit (fur) and Argonian (scales).
I hope you enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
Retexturizes female, head, body, hands, for all races except Khajiit (fur) and Argonian (scales).

Working on request for a mod for female tattoo, I had to work a non-dirty version of the females.
Having spent two days to do this mod, I found it a shame not to share it.
So here are my Beautiful Girls.
I hope you enjoy. I really worked hard to get this result.. 

First, download and install the two mods.
---------------------------------------------------------

FINALLY actual fixed female face normal maps
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=136

And

DXT compression error female nose and face normal map pixel
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=438

Instalation.
---------------
-Extract the file included in the archive in your \"Data\" folder of the game.

-Uninstall.
--------------
-Delete the files.

Sorry for my bad English.
author: Srimk
